attributes.title: glitches
attributes.review: Whenever i open it, it glitches out. Also, ever since i had the app, i’ve gotten ads on my HOME SCREEN. I think its a virus. Would not recommend!

attributes.title: Don’t download
attributes.review: This app has been very glitch every time I click something an orange face pops up it also makes my phone vibrate

attributes.title: Horrible!!!
attributes.review: This app is horrible. It doesn’t work correctly and has made my phone glitch!!! Thanks to this app my phone now has a virus!!! Who let this app be on the App Store
This app is ridiculously slow and horrible. I would 100% not recommend downloading. I had to delete it immediately.

attributes.title: ⚠️Worse then the year 2020😿✨
attributes.review: App is a bust it keeps telling me I am gonna get deported and that the “China virus” is coming for me I am concerned for the creator for the app cause homie needs to be put in jail and put in a chair preferably ✨electric✨ but anyways DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS GARBAGE APP... Thanks for understanding❤️😼

attributes.title: worst app ever
attributes.review: the app downloaded fast which leaves me suspicious. what is trump doing to make HIS app download fast? also this app was L A G G Y LAGGY like i couldn’t see the first page of it for two months!!! this app killed my father.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: This app deserves to get removed ✨ it’s just an ugly app like why would you want to have an app representing a cheeto puff 👁👁 ugh disgusting 🙄 would not recommend AT ALL deleted this app please Nd thank you ✨ oh Nd one more thing  ALL APPS MATTER 😗

attributes.title: Garb
attributes.review: This app is so difficult to use and has way to many bugs to be considered even a DECENT app 10/10 would NOT recommend. Don’t waste your time y’all🙄

attributes.title: Our lord and savior President 🍊
attributes.review: I never thought downloading an app to support my favorite President would lead to a zombie apocalypse 😪. I’m apparently not the only one facing this issue and now all I can think about is... bRaInS 🧠🤤

attributes.review: It glitches when I tried opening and just gives me a blank screen 0/10 don’t recommend
